code:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. HELLO.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           DISPLAY 'HELLO WORLD'.
           STOP RUN.
ground_truth: A simple COBOL program that prints 'HELLO WORLD' to the console and terminates execution.

code:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. CALC.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 NUM1 PIC 9(2) VALUE 10.
       01 NUM2 PIC 9(2) VALUE 20.
       01 TOTAL PIC 9(3).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
           ADD NUM1 TO NUM2 GIVING TOTAL.
           DISPLAY 'SUM IS: ' TOTAL.
           STOP RUN.
ground_truth: This COBOL program defines two variables NUM1 and NUM2, calculates their sum, stores it in TOTAL, and displays the result.
